channel.title: 289 Prayer Tab
channel.description:
So a while ago I thought I'd replicate a 289 Prayer Tab on a modern looking Client. I'd just like some ideas on how to add the Black Box for the text while still keeping the 289 look. Removing the two Heart prayers would give me room, but those are going to be replaced and implemented in-game.
http://postimage.org/image/mh34hd3od
